title: What is the significance of sudden anxiety and apparitions in achieving a state of consciousness during a solar ritual?
first_phrase: This text describes the author's experience with a strange phenomenon that interrupted their attempts at achieving a certain state of consciousness. Suddenly, they saw their "other" self leaving their body, leading to a plunge into unconsciousness. The author thinks that this phenomenon has happened before, and others in their group have experienced it as well. The text also references alchemy and purification of metals. The last 200 tokens describe a curious detail: a seemingly insignificant phrase from an alchemy book that suddenly became fixed in the author's mind, giving them a strange and unsettling sensation.

Un dettaglio curioso: una frase piuttosto insignificante che avevo letto in un libro di alchimia, ad un tratto si presentò nella mia memoria, e cominciò a tornare e ritornare con insistenza, senza alcun motivo, come una idea fissa: « FELICI GLI ATTEONI CIIE GIUNGONO A VEDERE LA DIANA TUTTA NUDA ». Questa frase adesso mi dava una sensazione strana, inquietante, non scevra di una certa sensualità, onde mi meravigliavo assai.
